attributes.action: Close all educational facilities due to spreading of coronavirus (COVID-19)
attributes.additional_details: Take Italy as a reference to how bad it could be within a week
attributes.background: Close all educational facilities to help stop the spread of coronavirus (COVID-19) children and young people may not be the high risk age but they high risk spreaders

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions calling for the same action:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300403
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300628

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
